Rules-Based System (RBS)
========================

Used for:

* Creating an RBS pipeline, which can be used to predict a target based on a set of rules. 
* Optimising a given RBS pipeline for maximum performance.

.. currentmodule:: iguanas.rbs

.. autosummary::
   :nosignatures:
   :toctree: api/
   :template: class.rst

   RBSPipeline
   RBSOptimiser
